name: BLOBBOUS
description:
BLOBBOUS is a top-down hack'n'slash game where you control a guy with a big sword and try to smack as many colored blobs as possible.

With time passing the game gets harder because more and more blobs will spawn and try to squash you under their jelly bodies. (Or rip you apart with their teeth.)

This is my first somewhat completed game. It's a partial clone of an old flash game called AmorphousX (you can find it on Kongregate for example). The original was far more fleshed out than this and I will definitely revisit this game at a later point to add more enemy types and weapons and such.
